Recent Work

About

Hello, my name is Ashley and I love bringing the web to life. I've been working for the good folks at Volusion for the past two years as a front end developer.

When I'm not fiddling on my laptop, you'll find me soaking up the sun at the nearest watering hole, preferably the San Marcos River.

Taking on small side projects is a great way to expand my skillset, so if you're interested, please contact me.

Around the Web

Copyright © Ashley Hebler 2015

Bodhi Movement Yoga

This project was a full design and development project for an up and coming yoga studio, based out of Jackson, New Jersey. The package included logo design and the site is designed to be fully responsive on all devices. The site was built using Bootstrap and Wordpress.

  • Client: Bodhi Movement Yoga
  • Date: June 2014
  • Service: Design/WordPress Template
Launch Site

Lisa Lewis-Nourzad

Lisa Lewis-Nourzad is one of the best real estate professionals you'll find in Austin, Texas. I designed this Austin-inspired logo for her to use in her email signature and marketing materials.

  • Client: Lisa Lewis-Nourzad
  • Date: October 2013
  • Service: Logo Design
Launch Site

Hebler Blueberries

This was a project for my family's blueberry farm in Ringgold, LA.

  • Client: Hebler Blueberries
